ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Attack speedups
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I like your later points, but this is totally untrue.  My point was they do succeed just as well in Sol A without me.  Only difference is they take turns
ygData.messageBody:
>well, learning more of your story, I whole heartedly agree.

>You cannot go to sol a with no tanks at that level. Simply can't be done.

>Draelon

I like your later points, but this is totally untrue. My point was they do
succeed just as well in Sol A without me. Only difference is they take
turns seeing who dies once per night instead of me every night. They get
just as much xp and loot in the same amount of time. They don't need a tank
in Sol A and having someone who can only tank and not very well just means
that person gets to be the nightly martyr who dies in the bad pull. Might
as well have it be a caster who can be back in 30 seconds.

kitasi
